item.title: Tropico 7 Announced For 2026 Release
item.content:encoded:
The next game in the long-running Tropico series has been announced as Tropico 7 is heading to console and PC in 2026.

In a short reveal trailer during the Xbox Gamescom showcase, it was announced that Tropico 7 will be available for Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, and PC. The game will also be available day one on Xbox Game Pass.

No other details about the game were revealed. Nor was it mentioned when more information will be announced.

Are you excited to for the next game in the popular dictator-simulation franchise? Let us know down below, and take the discussion even further in the official Insider Gaming forums.

For more Insider Gaming, check out the latest news surrounding the ASUS ROG Xbox Ally. And don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter. 

SUBSCRIBE to our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive leaks every week! No Spam.



https://insider-gaming.com/tropico-7-announced-for-2026-release/

item.title: Xbox Ally Release Date Confirmed
item.content:encoded:
The ASUS ROG Xbox Ally has an official release date.

After weeks and months of rumors and leaks, it was officially confirmed on Wednesday that the Xbox Ally X and Xbox Ally will launch on October 16. The announcement came during the official Xbox Gamescom stream.

What fans might be surprised to find out, however, was that only a release date was announced. What wasn’t confirmed was the price of the devices, at least at the time of publishing. Even in the official post on social media, pricing wasn’t mentioned.

There are rumors circulating on the floor in Cologne regarding the price after it was leaked yet again that it will cost $549.99 for the Xbox Ally and $899.99 for the Xbox Ally X. However, it’s pure speculation at this time.

When official pricing information is announced, it will be added to this story.

What do you think of Microsoft announcing the release date of the Xbox Ally but not the pricing? Let us know down below, and take the discussion further in the official Insider Gaming forums.

For more Insider Gaming, check out everything that was announced during Opening Night Live. And don’t forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.
